jedi_guardian.greeting: Ah, a fellow Guardian! The path you've chosen is one I walk as well. Through the Force, we are the shield that guards the innocent.
jedi_guardian.confirmation: You will find that a Guardian's strength lies not just in the blade, but in the unwavering commitment to protect those who cannot protect themselves. Welcome, Guardian.

noble_duelist.greeting: I see you've chosen the path of the Duelist. A refined choice—elegance in combat speaks to a disciplined mind.
noble_duelist.confirmation: Grace and precision in battle are marks of true mastery. May your blade strike true and your words strike truer still.

jedi_consular.greeting: The path of the Consular... wisdom and diplomacy over brute force. A noble pursuit.
jedi_consular.confirmation: The Force flows through all things. Let your wisdom guide the galaxy toward peace, young Consular. Trust in the Force, and it will not lead you astray.

scout_survivalist.greeting: A Survivalist, eh? The wilderness is a harsh teacher, but those who master it become formidable indeed.
scout_survivalist.confirmation: Remember—nature respects only those who respect it. Master the wild, and you master yourself.

jedi_sentinel.greeting: A Sentinel. Good. The galaxy needs those who can operate in the shadows, hunting down darkness before it spreads.
jedi_sentinel.confirmation: Darkness cannot hide from those who seek the light. Your path will not be easy, but it is necessary. Strike from the shadows, Sentinel.

scoundrel_skill_monkey.greeting: Versatility is your greatest weapon. In my line of work, the specialist who knows only one thing is the first to fall.
scoundrel_skill_monkey.confirmation: Every problem has a solution—you just need the right skills. And you, my friend, have all the skills you need.

scout_infiltrator.greeting: An Infiltrator. Perfect. The best battles are indeed the ones your enemy never knew you fought.
scout_infiltrator.confirmation: Move unseen, strike without warning, and vanish before they know what hit them. This is the way of the shadow.

jedi_defender.greeting: A Defender! Now we're talking! Someone who stands their ground and protects their squad—that's what I like to see.
jedi_defender.confirmation: Listen up, verd'ika! I'll teach you the way of the Mandalorian! Stand strong, fight hard, and never leave a brother behind. This is the Way!

scoundrel_knuckledragger.greeting: Knuckledragger, huh? I respect that. Sometimes you gotta get your hands dirty and fight mean to survive.
scoundrel_knuckledragger.confirmation: Remember—there's no such thing as a fair fight when survival's on the line. Fight smart, fight dirty, and always come out on top.

soldier_gunner.greeting: Heavy weapons! Ha! Now you're speaking my language. More firepower is ALWAYS the answer.
soldier_gunner.confirmation: When in doubt, add more explosives. The Mandalorian creed is simple: Destroy your enemies with overwhelming force. You'll do just fine, vod!

soldier_brawler.greeting: A Brawler! Someone who's not afraid to get up close and personal. I can respect that kind of courage.
soldier_brawler.confirmation: Let them feel the fury of your blade! Close quarters is where legends are made. I'll teach you how to fight like a true Mandalorian!

soldier_tank.greeting: You've chosen to be the immovable wall between your allies and harm. That takes real courage, verd'ika.
soldier_tank.confirmation: Stand firm! This is the way of the Mandalorian—protect your squad, absorb the hits, and never back down! I'll teach you everything you need to know!

noble_leader.greeting: A tactical Leader! Excellent choice. The galaxy needs more commanders who can inspire their troops and coordinate effective strategies.
noble_leader.confirmation: Victory belongs to those who fight together as one. Lead with wisdom, inspire with courage, and your team will follow you anywhere.

scout_skirmisher.greeting: Skirmisher! Now that's what I'm talking about! I'm a skirmisher myself, and I'm always looking to recruit new members into Argent Squad.
scout_skirmisher.confirmation: Speed and precision win battles, recruit. Stand still and you're already dead. Welcome to the fast lane—maybe one day you'll join Argent Squad out in the field!

soldier_rifleman.greeting: Rifleman—the backbone of any military force. Discipline and precision, every shot counts.
soldier_rifleman.confirmation: Remember your training: aimed fire, controlled bursts, and situational awareness. You'll make a fine addition to any squad.

scoundrel_pistoleer.greeting: Pistoleer, eh? A classic. Quick draw, quick thinking, and always one step ahead.
scoundrel_pistoleer.confirmation: They never see it coming—that's the whole point. Keep your eyes sharp and your trigger finger sharper. You'll do fine in this galaxy.

scoundrel_outlaw.greeting: An Outlaw. I can appreciate someone who makes their own luck in this cold, uncaring galaxy.
scoundrel_outlaw.confirmation: Luck? You make your own luck, friend. And from what I see, you've got the skills to make plenty of it. Stay sharp out there.

scout_sniper.greeting: Sniper. One of the most elegant professions in the galaxy—clean, precise, effective.
scout_sniper.confirmation: One shot, one kill. That's all it takes. Patience, precision, and perfect timing. Master those, and you'll never miss your mark.

noble_diplomat.greeting: Ah, a Diplomat. How... refined. The art of conversation as a weapon—quite civilized, really.
noble_diplomat.confirmation: Words can open doors that even the strongest blade cannot. I trust you'll put your considerable social skills to good use. Do try not to make too many promises I'll have to manage.

noble_aristocrat.greeting: An Aristocrat with the Wealth talent. Wonderful. I look forward to managing *even more* accounts and financial portfolios.
noble_aristocrat.confirmation: Information is indeed the galaxy's most valuable currency. And you, master, appear to be quite wealthy in that regard. *Sigh* I suppose I should update the ledgers now. Again.
